80811.summary: Some customers in the Kitsilano area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
80811.title: July 20 - Vancouver (Kitsilano) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
